ComicInfo.Summary:
Start of the long-awaited America 2 and the first of the reprints creep in to the Megazine, with Necropolis from 2000ad.
Free gift - World of Dredd trading card
Cover: Colin Macneil (America: Fading of the Light)
Judge Dredd - America: Fading of the Light (part 1) (John Wagner - Colin Macneil)Missionary Man - The Big Sleazy (part 3 - final part) (Gordon Rennie - Simon Fraser)Holocaust 12 - Skyfall (part 1) (Chris Standley and John Smith - Jim Murray)Judge Dredd - Countdown to Necropolis (reprint from 2000ad 671-673) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra)
